about_the_game:
Withstand challenging environments and conquer the battlefield with the Chemical Combat Gear Set for the Security team.

Contains five different cosmetic gear pieces:

- Chemical Combat Helmet
- Chemical Combat Top
- Chemical Combat Bottom
- Chemical Combat Gloves
- Chemical Combat Boots

These items are unlocked in-game immediately upon purchase and can be combined with other cosmetic gear pieces. They can be equipped in-game in the Customize menu, which can be accessed from the Main menu.

The Chemical Combat Gear Set is included in the Crisis Set Bundle.
